body_html:
Following the installation instructions here when I run this it works

export TF_BINARY_URL=https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/mac/cpu/tensorflow-0.11.0rc1-py3-none-any.whl

BUT on the next step of

pip3 install --upgrade $TF_BINARY_URL

I get the error HTTP error 404 while getting https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/mac/cpu/tensorflow-0.11.0rc1-py3-none-any.whl
body_text:
Following the installation instructions here when I run this it works
export TF_BINARY_URL=https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/mac/cpu/tensorflow-0.11.0rc1-py3-none-any.whl

BUT on the next step of
pip3 install --upgrade $TF_BINARY_URL

I get the error HTTP error 404 while getting https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/mac/cpu/tensorflow-0.11.0rc1-py3-none-any.whl
body:
Following the installation instructions [here](https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.11/get_started/os_setup.html#virtualenv-installation) when I run this it works

```
export TF_BINARY_URL=https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/mac/cpu/tensorflow-0.11.0rc1-py3-none-any.whl
```

BUT on the next step of 

```
pip3 install --upgrade $TF_BINARY_URL
```

I get the error `HTTP error 404 while getting https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/mac/cpu/tensorflow-0.11.0rc1-py3-none-any.whl`

```
```
